product_details.description: True icons never die; they just get better with time. Major V is no different. From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined. Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure. MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND: Thunderous bass, smooth mids and crisp treble. Major V delivers the Marshall signature sound you know and love. 100+ HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYTIME: Your next adventure awaits, and Major V is in for the ride. Packing 100+ hours of wireless playtime, you can be gone for days. RUGGED AND FOLDABLE DESIGN: Rugged so that it lasts. Foldable for compact storage. Major is an instant classic for the fifth time running. CUSTOMISABLE M-BUTTON: Instantly access the Spotify Tap default function or your EQ settings or voice assistant thanks to Major V’s M-button and the Marshall Bluetooth app WIRELESS CHARGING: We don’t like wires either, they just get in the way. Thanks to wireless charging, it’s simple to give Major V a boost when needed. Brand - Marshall ** Color - Black ** Ear Placement - On Ear ** Form Factor - On Ear ** Noise Control - None **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, modern design tailored for tech product advertising. The background sets a moody, high-tech tone with a deep black gradient accented by wave-like dark overlays and two subtle golden circular diffusions at diagonal corners. At the center top, the "heading" text layer showcases the brand in bold white uppercase, complemented directly beneath by the "subheading" text in a gold futuristic font. Below, the "tagline" layer emphasizes the product’s wireless capacity in white. The central element is the "product_image" of high-quality black headphones. Pricing is reinforced with the bold "price" text in white, just above a bright gold "cta_button" rectangle, which includes the black "cta_text" call-to-action. The composition balances contrast and legibility effectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #121212 (Background)
- Charcoal Gray: #1E1E1E (Wave overlays)
- Gold: #D4AF37 (Accent and CTA background)
- White: #FFFFFF (Text and highlights)
- Black: #000000 (CTA Text)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek black Marshall headphone with a premium, textured finish. The dominant color is matte black (#1C1C1C), giving it a bold and modern feel. The texture adds depth, blending slightly lighter tones like charcoal black (#2B2B2B) to create visual complexity. The golden metallic accent (#CBA135) on the base provides a luxurious contrast and subtly draws attention without overwhelming the aesthetic. The white Marshall logo (#FFFFFF) stands out crisply against the black backdrop, enhancing brand visibility. This minimalist palette of black, charcoal, gold, and white forms a high-contrast, professional tone, ideal for stylish, premium-themed advertisement banners.
